placeholderImages.description: 3D model render of Aerovision multi-camera hardware.
Close-up of the adjustable imaging sensors on the hardware.
A view of the internal components and wiring of the hardware, showing the complexity and precision engineering.
The multi-camera hardware mounted on an aerial platform, ready for an operation.
An engineer working on the calibration of the multi-camera hardware in a workshop.
A high-resolution orthomosaic map generated by the Aerovision platform.
